member.name: T:IdeaBlade.UI.WinForms.Deployment.AppUpdater
member.summary: The AppUpdater class is responsible for versioning and updating a client application over the web.
member.remarks: Call Update() to check for a new version and update the client application. The IdeaBlade help file explains in detail the steps required for deploying a new version of the application.

member.name: M:IdeaBlade.UI.WinForms.Deployment.AppUpdater.Update
member.summary: Checks for a new version and prompts the user to update if found.

member.name: M:IdeaBlade.UI.WinForms.Deployment.AppUpdater.Update(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Checks for a new version and updates the application if found.
member.param: If false, prompts the user whether or not to update.

member.name: M:IdeaBlade.UI.WinForms.Deployment.AppUpdater.NewVersionAvailable
member.summary: Returns true if a new version is available.

member.name: T:IdeaBlade.UI.WinForms.Deployment.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: Provides a class that manages distributed application updating and versioning.

member.name: M:IdeaBlade.UI.WinForms.Deployment.DownloadingDialog.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Clean up any resources being used.

member.name: M:IdeaBlade.UI.WinForms.Deployment.DownloadingDialog.InitializeComponent
member.summary: Required method for Designer support, do not modify the contents of this method with the code editor.
